meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>instant</kanji> <kanji>sit</kanji> is <vocabulary>immediate</vocabulary>. It's also <vocabulary>instantaneous</vocabulary>. Just imagine yourself sitting instantly. No time passes between when you were standing and sitting. The instantaneous nature of your sit is definitely... troubling.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
